responsibilities: Work with a wide range of systems, processes, and technologies and own and solve problems end-to-end.
Collaborate in a fast-paced environment involving different stakeholders and subject matter experts.
Design solutions for users that help them get their jobs done, turning complex industrial knowledge into understandable visuals and questions into graph queries.
Design and implement elegant user experiences.
Be actively involved in setting product and technical direction and decision making.
Work closely with skilled users to understand their needs and build products to help them succeed.
skills: Solid grasp of JavaScript and enjoy the benefits of TypeScript.
Front-end experience in frameworks such as React, Angular, Vue, or similar.
Experience with cloud development, including Kubernetes, Docker, or related technologies.
Familiarity with Azure, AWS, and GCP is a plus.
Ability to learn other coding languages and use the language best fit for purpose.
Ability to prioritize tasks and distribute time and resources efficiently to optimize for impact.
Ability to write well-structured, efficient, and maintainable code and actively keep the quality of the codebase in check.
qualifications: Experience as a lead developer on projects is a big plus.
Experience with architecting front-end tiers for complex domains.
Knowledge of GraphQL or graph databases.
Experience building backend services with Kotlin, Java, or Python.
